title: Kaweco AL Sport Fountain Pen (Fine Nib) + Pack of 6 Royal Blue Ink Cartridges Gift Set (Brass)
features: Kaweco AL Sport Fountain Pen, Fine Nib plus a Pack of 6 Ink Cartridges
Each set includes a Kaweco AL Sport Fine Nib Fountain Pen and a set of 6 Royal Blue Ink Cartridges
Kaweco AL Sport Fountain Pen available in Special Edition Rose Gold, Brass, or New Deep Red. Choose your favourite colour!
Presented in a Vintage Kaweco Gift Tin
description: The Perfect Kaweco Gift Set for any stationery lover this Christmas. Give this ideal starter's set including one Kaweco AL Sport Fine Nib Fountain Pen, in beautiful Rose Gold, Silver or Deep Red and one pack of Royal Blue Ink Cartridges (6 cartridges per pack!) so they can get started writing straightaway. The ideal Back to School set or Gift for any stationery addict.
